excerpt: It’s been a great year at shapers: we’ve aquired some new (very cool) clients. So even though we’ve been up to our ears in work I’ve managed to conjure up a little christmas/newyears card.
title: merry christmas and a happy newyear
content: It’s been a great year at shapers: we’ve aquired some new (very cool) clients. So even though we’ve been up to our ears in work I’ve managed to conjure up a little christmas/newyears card.
